net.conquiris.index

Class DirectoryIndexerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.conquiris.index.AbstractLocalIndexerService
      • net.conquiris.index.DirectoryIndexerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexActiveFlag, IndexerService, IndexStartedFlag, IndexStatusProperty, LocalIndexerService

    public final class DirectoryIndexerService
extends AbstractLocalIndexerService
    Default directory-based indexer service implementation.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez

        Description copied from interface: LocalIndexerService
        Returns the last known index status.

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: IndexerService
        Starts the service. It is a no-op if the service is already running.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: IndexerService
        Stops the service. It is a no-op if the service is already stopped.

      • setCheckpoint

        public void setCheckpoint(String checkpoint)
        Description copied from interface: IndexerService
        Schedules a tasks that changes the index checkpoint. It is a no-op if the service is stopped or the activation policy is disabled. This operation is asynchronous.

      • reindex

        public void reindex()
        Description copied from interface: IndexerService
        Schedules a tasks that changes the index checkpoint. It is a no-op if the service is stopped or the activation policy is disabled. This operation is asynchronous.

      • isIndexStarted

        public boolean isIndexStarted()
        Description copied from interface: IndexStartedFlag
        Returns true if and only if the service is started.
